name: God's Will (itch) (Ali Irdiren)
description:
WARNING!: epilepsy, descriptions of violence, language!

God's will is a visual novel-like game about the apocalypse.

You play as one of 3 dinosaurs, sent to carry out a simple task: destruction. Each has their own paths to take, but be careful cause should they fail, it will not be their enemies who meet their end, but they themselves!

While making this game we just aimed to have fun writing and drawing absurd things. The colors are meant to upset your eyes, and the story is intended to upset your brain.

We hope you will enjoy it as much as we enjoyed making it!

Art, Music, Game Design: Ali @ https://autumnmnmn.itch.io

Art, Writing, Game Design: Bee @ https://tinyworkerb.itch.io
